titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place of holding court for the District of Arizona.
To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place of holding court for the District of Arizona.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet

bill.summary: Amends the federal judicial code to add Flagstaff as a location where court will be held for the District of Arizona.
